Activity.ActivityHistoryError.Descriptio: Something went wrong while trying to load activity history. Please try again.
Activity.Bookmarks.Description:
A record of your victories, satisfaction, and dismay.

Here lies all activities which you've added to your bookmarks. Stand tall, Guardian, and bask in your glory.
Activity.Bookmarks.Empty:
You haven't added any bookmarks yet!

You can sync your bookmarks by enabling sync in _Settings_.

Activity.Carnage.SelectDate.Info: Select a date below and prepare to jump
Activity.Carnage.SelectDate.NotFound: The requested period could not be found in this character's activity history.
Activity.Carnage.SelectDate.Waiting:
Strap in—the more activities you play and the further you jump, the longer this'll take!

Bungie's API doesn't enable requesting activity history from a specific period, so we're doing a drive-by.
Activity.DownloadReports.Name: Downloading Reports
Activity.GenericError.Description: Something went wrong. Please try again.
Activity.Graphs.Description: Activities plotted against graphs, for the statistically inclined.

Activity.HydrateReportsCache.Description: Restoring reports data from device storage
Activity.Legends.Description: Every Guardian's first raid against humanity's fiercest foes is a memory entwined and bound by raw emotion. Revisit these shared memories and reflect.
Activity.Legends.Name: Legends
Activity.Legends.NoRaidCompletions: Find a fireteam and seek triumph against enemies of the Traveler.
Activity.SelectMode: To drill down to a specific activity, select a mode from the interface above
App.ErrorBoundary.Discord: Braytech has encountered a fatal error. If one of the available actions does not resolve your issue, please join the [Discord](https://discord.bray.tech) for further assistance.
App.ErrorBoundary.Version: Please quote the following string when reporting this error.
App.FriendlyError.Description: Please, do not tell Commander Zavala... Yet.
App.FriendlyError.Name: Pardon Our Dust
App.NetworkError.Description: A network error has occurred. This is a temporary error which may be resolved by reloading or navigating away from this view.

App.ServiceWorkerInstalling.Description: An app update is installing in the background.
App.ServiceWorkerReload.Description:
A fresh update for Braytech is available. Please select reload to use a better version of this app.

Check the change log on the index view for details on what's new.
App.ServiceWorkerReload.Name: Update Available
App.UnsupportedBrowser.Description:
Braytech requires modern browser features in order to operate. The minumum browser requirements are set to allow browsers that are well over a year old to run Braytech. As such, if you encounter this message, it's time to move on to something new.

A Chromium-based browser such as Microsoft Edge is recommended.@CLASSNAME=warning@
App.UnsupportedBrowser.Name: Unsupported Browser
Archives.ChaliceOfOpulence.Description:
A tool that enables users to rapidly discover required rune combinations for specific rewards from _The Menagerie_, an activity from Destiny 2's Season of Opulence.

_The Menagerie_ is a vast prison-like museum located in the lower decks of Calus's Leviathan. It served as an enclosure to all the different species Calus collected amidst his journeys, including the Hive, Vex, and Arkborn, and pits them against the Guardians invited aboard for their pleasure and glory as well as his own entertainment.
Archives.ChaliceOfOpulence.Name: Chalice of Opulence
Archives.Grimoire.Description:
The lore of old, Destiny 1's Grimoire cards are backed up, archived, and preserved here. Grimoire is a database within Destiny. Entries were unlocked through playing the game in the form of "cards."

The list of Grimoire entries is sorted into six main categories—Guardian, Inventory, Allies, Enemies, Places, and Activities. Each of these categories has a number of sub-categories.
Archives.Grimoire.Name: Grimoire
Archives.Guides.VowOfTheDisciple.Name: Archives.Guides.VowOfTheDisciple.Name
Auth.Data.Description: Delete the authentication data stored on your device. While unnecessary, this function is provided for your peace of mind.
Auth.Data.Name: Authentication Data
Auth.Error.NoAuth.Description:
Some features of Braytech require your written permission to activate, generally to protect your privacy.

To use this feature, please tell Bungie that you approve. No personal information is shared by doing so—only an authentication code with which you may interact with more API endpoints.
Auth.Error.NoAuth.Name: Authentication Required
Auth.Error.Permissions.Profile.Descripti:
You are not authorised to access a different user's profile data, but you may use these helpful links to return to your own.

You can find more information regarding your authentication in the _Settings_ view.
Auth.Error.Permissions.Profile.Name: Oh, honey... Honnnnneyyyy
Auth.Memberships.Description: These are the memberships that are currently associated with your Bungie.net profile.
Auth.Memberships.Name: Associated Memberships
Auth.PatreonAssociation.Description: Associate this Bungie.net profile with a Patreon account.
Auth.PatreonAssociation.Name: Patreon Association
Auth.PatreonAssociation.Success: Thanks! Your email is now associated with your profiles
Auth.PatreonAssociation.Text: Some Patreon tiers include rewards in the form of _flair_ which is displayed at the side of your player name. Enable display of relevant flair by entering the email associated with your Patreon account.
Auth.Suggestion.Subtle: Login with Bungie.net to unlock more features.
Character.DIMSync.Description: This feature requires DIM Sync to function. Enable DIM Sync in _Settings_.
Character.DIMSync.Name: DIM Sync
Character.Vendors.CrossSaveSilver: Your Silver balance is returned by the API only for the platform which you are currently playing the game on.
Clan.Administration.ViewportWidth: Administration is intended for use on larger displays. Please use a display with a viewport of atleast `1280px`.
Clan.ClanBannerBuilder.Description: Collaborate with clan members on a new clan banner: make your selections and tap Share to show off your style.
Clan.ClanBannerBuilder.Name: Clan Banner Builder
Clan.HistoricalStats.ViewportWidth: Historical stats is intended for use on larger displays. Please use a display with a viewport of atleast `1024px`.
Clan.NoClan.Description:
Clans are optional groups of friends that enhance your online gaming experience. Coordinate with your clanmates to take on co-op challenges or just simply represent them in your solo play to earn extra rewards.

Join your friend's clan, meet some new friends, or create your own on the companion app or at bungie.net.
Clan.NoClan.Name: No clan affiliation
Clan.Relationships.Description:
Discover missed opportunities and secret lovers. These Guardians are those who you play most activities with. Cherish each other.

These Guardians are your clan members and this ranking resets with every new season.
Clan.Relationships.Name: Relationships
Clan.Relationships.NoFriends: You're not alone–you'll make a friend eventually... Invite a clan friend to hang out for a few activities!
Clan.Relationships.NoParters: No one said dating was easy. Back to the fight, Guardian!
Clan.Relationships.SocialButterfly: You get around! You've played with everyone this season.

CustomisableLayout.Error.ColumnExclusive: Double and full-width modules are column exclusives. Try adding a module to another column.
CustomisableLayout.Error.RenderMisconfig: An error occurred while rendering module: {{moduleName}}. It would appear that it isn't configured properly. Try selecting a different module setting via _Customise_.

Event.FestivalOfTheLost.Description: Laugh in the face of death, collect candies, wear masks, and fight back against the encroaching darkness.
Event.FestivalOfTheLost.Name: Festival of the Lost
Event.IronBanner.Description: A special week-long Crucible event that challenges teams of six to go head-to-head in the most competitive form of Control.
Event.SolsticeOfHeroes.Description:
The annual tradition to honor the sacrifices of Guardians everywhere has come again. Eva has returned to the Tower and awaits you near the Statue of Heroes. Gather and celebrate the resilience of humanity’s foremost defenders.

Complete all objectives on all items in a set to unlock the next set. Complete objectives on Magnificent gear to unlock its glow, and access to others.
Event.SolsticeOfHeroes.Description.Exten:
The annual tradition to honor the sacrifices of Guardians everywhere has come again. Eva has returned to the Tower and awaits you near the Statue of Heroes. Gather and celebrate the resilience of humanity’s foremost defenders.

Fly the friendly skies of the European Aerial Zone (EAZ) and take on the Hive, Cabal, and Fallen. Once you’ve dispatched your foes in this three-player matchmade activity, set out across the EAZ in search of treasure chests. The more bosses you defeat, the more rewards you’ll earn.
Event.SolsticeOfHeroes.Name: Solstice of Heroes 2021
Event.TheDawning.Description: Even the biting chill of Europa can’t freeze the warm hearts of Guardians during this special time of year. The Dawning has returned.
Event.TheDawning.Name: The Dawning
FAQ.API.StatDiscrepancy.Description:
There are multiple sources for stats in Destiny. Clan Historical Stats is based on the HistoricalStats API endpoint while others source their data from PGCRs (Post Game Carnage Reports). It's hard to determine which holds the most accurate truth.

To display stats in the manner seen on Clan Historical Stats would require downloading terabytes of data from Bungie servers and significant compute power. This said, they're accurate enough for some friendly competition.
FAQ.API.StatDiscrepancy.Name: Clan Historical Stats don't match [other thing]
FAQ.Braytech.AppStore.Description: Braytech is available on Apple's [App Store](https://apps.apple.com/app/braytech/id1593151816), [Google Play](https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=braytech.org.twa), and the [Microsoft Store](https://www.microsoft.com/en-us/p/braytech/9pmp910vslz8)!
FAQ.Braytech.AppStore.Name: App stores
FAQ.Braytech.Commonality.Description:
Commonly asked, "What is the funny percentage to the right of collectibles and records?"

It's a percentage of players who've either discovered or redeemed the item. Every few days, _Voluspa_ collects data from users of _Braytech_ and takes note of who's got what.

It's been a hot topic as to whether it's accurate or useful and the truth is that all statistics are useless and dumb _unless_ you've included every single piece of data possible.

It's fair to assume that these stats are bias towards casual players (percentages may appear higher rather than lower due to the skill and attention of the users that are monitored).

Where available, tooltips for these stats include the total number of players who are counted as a part of this metric.{{indexed}}
FAQ.Braytech.Commonality.Name: Commonality
FAQ.Braytech.KeyboardShortcuts.Descripti: In addition to any action bar buttons with key symbols, Braytech has a variety of hidden keyboard shortcuts. From any view with a profile header (your character emblem, etc.), press and hold  to see which shortcuts are available. For example, press  to go to _Triumphs_ and  to return here.
FAQ.Braytech.KeyboardShortcuts.Name: Keyboard Shortcuts
FAQ.Braytech.ProfilePrivacy.Description:
If you're concerned for your privacy while playing Destiny and how the API exposes your progression and activities for use by third parties, you may alter your privacy settings on [Bungie.net](https://www.bungie.net/7/en/User/Account/Privacy).

Doing so will require that you authenticate Braytech with Bungie for continued use.
FAQ.Braytech.ProfilePrivacy.Name: Profile privacy
FAQ.Braytech.ServiceWorkerUpdate.Descrip:
From the _Settings_ view, you can try a variety of things. Start by selecting _Update Service Worker_.

If this fails, you can try reloading the app by selecting _Reload App_. If the problem continues to persist, please select _Dump Service Worker_ and report the issue via Discord.
FAQ.Braytech.ServiceWorkerUpdate.Name: Braytech won't update
FAQ.Voluspa.About.Description: _Voluspa_, named after a sub-mind of _Rasputin_, is what I've named the serverside component of Braytech. It's responsible for collating the profile data of Braytech's users for commonality statistics, settings sync, and other key features.
FAQ.Voluspa.About.Name: About Voluspa
GettingStarted.Header.Description:
Welcome to Braytech! Before you get started, I've got a handful of tips for you.

If you have feedback or questions, we can chat on Discord or you can check out the FAQ!
GettingStarted.Header.Name: Getting Started
GettingStarted.Tips.Customise.Descriptio:
Customise _Weeklies_ view to your liking by adjusting which modules are visible.

Tap _Customise_ from the toolbar and drag and drop some blocks!
GettingStarted.Tips.Customise.Name: Customise
GettingStarted.Tips.Search.Description:
Need to find something quick? Braytech has a search HUD, available anywhere in the app.

Press  or tap the magnifying glass button, and start typing!
GettingStarted.Tips.Search.Name: Search
GettingStarted.Tips.Settings.Description:
Braytech is jam-packed full of settings from dark themes to item visibility options to settings sync.

Find _Settings_ in the top corner.
GettingStarted.Tips.Settings.Name: Settings
Item.CouldntFindItemForUnequip: An item to equip in {{name}}'s place could not be found on the character which it's located.
Item.CurrentlyCantRoll: This perk can not currently roll for this weapon
Item.PerkEverything: This perk is highly sought after for all activities
Item.PerkPvE: This perk is encouraged for Vanguard engagements
Item.PerkPvP: This perk is encouraged for Crucible engagements
Item.TransferMaximumStack: {{name}} has a maximum stack size of {{size}}. Consume some items and try again.
Item.UndiscoveredCollectibleVendor: Acquire this item to add it to your Collections
Landing.Blog.Error: Blog posts couldn't be loaded at this time.
Landing.Blog.Name: Blog
Landing.CallToAction.Text: Explore Destiny through Braytech for sweet gains and insight into your fights against the forces of Darkness
Landing.Features.Description:
A project of pure passion, Braytech is years of experience, incremental additions, and improvements. While its original goal was professional development, it has since swelled into a staple of many Destiny players' experiences as Guardians.

Braytech started as a checklist app and has bellowed into a monstrosity of many talents. It's always being refined and expanded.

Need to find something quick? Press  and start typing! Braytech has a search HUD, available anywhere in the app.

Braytech is built for desktop users first, but functions as well and looks as beautiful on smaller devices. In fact, there's an [iPhone app](https://apps.apple.com/app/braytech/id1593151816) and an [Android app](https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=braytech.org.twa).

Want to make a suggestion? Join the [Discord](https://discord.bray.tech) or checkout the GitHub [Discussions](https://github.com/justrealmilk/braytech.org-discussion/discussions)!
Landing.Features.Name: Braytech
Landing.Support.Description:
Braytech is a full-time job—I design and develop to improve myself and to please you. I'm anti-ads, to my own demise. Your support helps me keep the lights on and allows me to do my best work.

Join the [Discord](https://discord.bray.tech) and the other patrons in the Braytech Research Division.
Landing.Support.Name: Are you a fan? Show your support
Landing.Updates.Name: Updates
Loading.BungieError.Description:
Crucial API data couldn't be loaded at this time. This is an intermittent issue. Please try again.

If this error does persist, the API may be experiencing a wider outage or your local network is restricting Bungie API requests.

Loading.Error.Description: Something very unexpected and irrecoverable occurred.

Something went wrong while trying to access browser storage.

Please reload the app and try again.
Loading.IndexedDBOpenFailedError.Descrip:
Something went wrong while trying to access browser storage.

Some browsers disallow access to _Indexed DB_ when browsing in private modes.

Please reload the app and try again.

The Bungie API is currently down for maintenance.

Tune into @BungieHelp on Twitter for more information.

Please reload the app and try again.

Maps.ProposeChanges.Form.Screenshots.Des:
Proposed screenshots must meet a strict quality criteria:
- display resolution of 1920x1080
- no visible HUD
- no visible Guardians or equipment
- no visible enemies
- maximum video settings
  - including a render resolution of 200%
Maps.Surveyor.NoNodes: Select a position on the map to begin.

Search.ShortcutKey: ### Press  to toggle search from anywhere
Search.Suggestions:
Search supports filters as prefixes. Try `name:mida` to only match entities whereby their name value includes the term "mida."

Supported prefixes:
- name
- description
- source
- expiration

You may also search by manifest `hash`.

Results will be prioritised by name, source, and description.

Upsell.Auth.Description: Want to see your objectives and other progress data? Authenticate with Bungie.net and allow Braytech to securely read your profile data.
Upsell.Profile.Description: Want to see your objective progress, redeemed records, discovered collectibles, and way more? Load your profile and select your character.
UserModules.AuthUpsell.Headline: Hey {{displayName}}, did you know you can authenticate Braytech with Bungie.net for access to more features
UserModules.AuthUpsell.Text: Most of Braytech's features are available to all users and depend on publically available data, but some of Destiny's features require more explicit access permissions which you can grant to Braytech by authenticating with Bungie.net.
UserModules.AuthUpsell.Upsell1.Descripti: Quests and bounties, step by step, reward by reward
UserModules.AuthUpsell.Upsell2.Descripti: Minimal though powerful clan management for rapid sorting and member actions
UserModules.AuthUpsell.Upsell2.Name: Clan Administration
UserModules.AuthUpsell.Upsell3.Descripti: Get helpful reminders regarding your soon to be overflowing postmaster
UserModules.AuthUpsell.Upsell4.Descripti: Secret new features are always in the pipeline...

UserModules.DreamingCityCurse.Flair1:
Savathûn's Curse begins to take hold on the Awoken's sacred city.

_Savathûn's Curse: implemented at the wish of Savathûn with Riven's dying breath and reset with every death of Dûl Incaru._
UserModules.DreamingCityCurse.Flair2:
Savathûn's Curse tightens its grip on _The Dreaming City_.

_Savathûn's Curse: implemented at the wish of Savathûn with Riven's dying breath and reset with every death of Dûl Incaru._
UserModules.DreamingCityCurse.Flair3:
Savathûn's Curse is at its full strength and its corruption touches every corner of the city.

_Savathûn's Curse: implemented at the wish of Savathûn with Riven's dying breath and reset with every death of Dûl Incaru._

Your most feared, devastating, tormenting nightmares reincarnate―be immovable in your resolve, Guardian.

_Hunt down this week's available nightmares for... satisfaction._
UserModules.Patreon.Description:
We all hate ads. They're ugly. They're annoying. They collect your data and sell it to third parties.

Help keep them away from Braytech by supporting the app through Patreon. Whether it's a one time thing or an ongoing commitment, every couple of dollars helps!
UserModules.Patreon.Name: Keep Braytech Ad-free
UserModules.Raids.Challenges.ALinkToTheC: During the Consecrated Mind encounter, all players must refresh their Enlightened buff at approximately the same time. However, the team may be split up at different tethers.
UserModules.Raids.Challenges.BaseInforma: During the Caretaker encounter, only one symbol energy charge may be carried at a time per Guardian.
UserModules.Raids.Challenges.ColiseumCha: Shuro Chi chase encounter: Guardians must not take damage from Shuro Chi's Arc Blast.
UserModules.Raids.Challenges.CopiesOfCop: Don't use airlocks to space Atraks's copies.
UserModules.Raids.Challenges.DefensesDow: Throughout the Exhibition encounter, each Guardian may only defeat one Disciple's Hourglass. Choose one to skip.
UserModules.Raids.Challenges.EnsemblesRe: During the Atheon encounter, each Guardian may only destroy one Oracle per set. As such, the Aegis wielder will need to partake.
UserModules.Raids.Challenges.ForeverFigh: Morgeth encounter: don't kill smol ogres, only kill big boi.
UserModules.Raids.Challenges.KeepOut: Vault encounter: knights must be killed in the rooms they spawn in.
UserModules.Raids.Challenges.LoopingCata: During the Dominion encounter, the primary crux may only be destroyed once per glyphs phase.
UserModules.Raids.Challenges.OfAllTrades: Over the course of the Descent encounter, each Guardian must equip each augment once. Await an augment deactivation before beginning the changeover. Play in pairs, shadowing a leader's rotation.
UserModules.Raids.Challenges.OutOfItsWay: During the Templar encounter, prevent the Templar from teleporting at all costs.
UserModules.Raids.Challenges.RedRover: Bypass Crypt Security while passing the Operator Augment to each fireteam member. Each Operator should activate two panels each over three damage phases.
UserModules.Raids.Challenges.StayingAliv: Complete the Consecrated Mind encounter without killing any Cyclops that spawn in the Harpy boss's presence. Cyclops that spawn in other areas, and during the final sprint, can be killed.
UserModules.Raids.Challenges.StrangersIn: During the Gatekeeper encounter, destroy the Praetorian Minotaur and Wyvern simultaneously.
UserModules.Raids.Challenges.StrengthOfM: Riven encounter: Guardians must not shoot the same eye twice.
UserModules.Raids.Challenges.SummoningRi: Kalli encounter: Cleanse all nine plates, kill all nine Knights, and kill all Ogres before damaging Kalli.
UserModules.Raids.Challenges.SwiftDestru: For the duration of the Acquisition encounter, each wave of [Stagger] Unstoppable Champions must be defeated within 5 seconds of one another or not at all.
UserModules.Raids.Challenges.TheCoreFour: During the final encounter, prior to each damage phase, break all four of Taniks' thrusters
UserModules.Raids.Challenges.TheOnlyOrac: During the Oracles encounter, no Guardian may shoot the same oracle. Rotate positions.
UserModules.Raids.Challenges.ToTheTop: Must always deposit 10 motes at any time during the Consecrated Mind encounter.
UserModules.Raids.Challenges.WaitForIt: During the Confluxes encounter, destroy Wyverns only while they're sacrificing against a conflux.
UserModules.Raids.Challenges.ZeroToOneHu: During the Sanctified Mind encounter, bank 30 motes at each Vex relay. At each relay, all 30 motes must be deposited within 10 seconds of one another.
UserModules.SeasonPass.Name: Season Pass
UserModules.TrialsOfOsiris.Determining: Rasputin has activated assets to determine the parameters of Saint-14's crucible.
UserModules.TrialsOfOsiris.UnavailableIr: Saint-14 has capitulated to a stronger, wiser Guardian, and suspended Trials for the duration of Lord Saladin's Iron Banner event.
UserModules.TrialsOfOsiris.UnavailableUn: Saint-14 has suspended Trials until {{date}}, when he'll unveil new challenges and rewards.
UserModules.Xûr.Error: A temporary error occurred while communicating with Voluspa.
UserModules.Xûr.Locating: Xûr hasn't been spotted yet, but once he has, his exotic armaments will be shown here.
Vendor.FailureStrings.UniquenessViolatio: Can only hold one at a time
Views.Activity.Description: Explore and filter your Post Game Carnage Reports in detail
Views.Activity.Name: Activity
Views.Addendums.Credits.Description: About the Guardians who make it possible
Views.Addendums.Credits.Name: Credits
Views.Addendums.Credits.Origins.Descript:
Braytech has been, and continues to be, a multipurpose facility for its developer to practice and learn how to better program and work with others. It started out as a cool hobby to help pass the time and transformed into a bit of a monster.

This beast is developed by a guy from Australia, but not without the moral support and guidance of others who he'd like to describe here.

The third party developer community that grows in Destiny's backyard is a kind one that helps one another and is a beautiful thing. So, shout outs to the crew at [Destiny Item Manager](https://destinyitemmanager.com/), [Richard Deveraux](https://lowlidev.com.au/), and all the others who've kept Tom sane while he tries to do the silly things he does.
Views.Addendums.FAQ.Description: The frequently asked and easy to answer
Views.Addendums.FAQ.Name: Frequently Asked Questions
Views.Addendums.Privacy.Info:
The long and skinny of it is that Braytech doesn't use cookies or any other mechanism to track you, nor does it target you for advertising purposes (I mean, Braytech doesn't have any ads).

If you have any questions further to the point of this notice, feel free to jump into the [Discord](https://discord.bray.tech).
Views.Addendums.Privacy.Name: Privacy Policy
Views.Addendums.Privacy.Policy:
1.  Introduction
    1. For all purposes, this English language version of this Privacy Policy shall be the original, governing instrument, and understanding of the parties. In the event of any conflict between this English language version of this Privacy Policy and any subsequent translation into any other language, this English language version shall govern and control.
    2. Braytech is a free fan made service for Destiny 2, the video game. This privacy policy explains how your data is used by this application.
    3. Braytech is constantly improving, and the developer may modify this Privacy Policy from time to time to reflect changes in their privacy practices. You are encouraged to review this Privacy Policy periodically and to check the date at the end of the Privacy Policy for the most recent version.
    4. Herein, the "developer" refers to Tom Chapman.
2. Information the developer collects
    1. Information provided by You
        1. Your platform specific profile name is used to load and display your Destiny profile. At no point are your private credentials collected or used.
        2. Patrons of Braytech may also optionally provide their email address as a means to associate their Destiny profile with their Patreon account in order to receive the appropriate flair for their Patreon pledge.
    2. Information the developer automatically collects
        1. Data regarding your usage of the services provided including your IP address, geographical location, browser name and version, operating system, referral source, length of visit, page views, and navigation paths, as well as information about the timing, frequency, and pattern of your service use.
3. How your personal data is used
    1. Destiny and Bungie account info
        1. In order to display and manipulate Destiny game information, Braytech uses the Bungie.net API. The only information Braytech receives, or has access to, is your game information (items, characters, etc.) and basic account information including your Bungie.net membership ID, and the identifiers of any linked services such as your public PSN, Xbox Live, Steam, Stadia, Blizzard, or Bungie.net usernames. The developer does not have access to your email, name, address, payment information, or any other personal information held by Bungie or the game platforms.
        2. Use of the Bungie.net API is governed by the [Terms of Use](https://www.bungie.net/7/en/Legal/Terms) and [Privacy Policy](https://www.bungie.net/7/en/Legal/PrivacyPolicy) for Bungie.net.
    2. Patreon
        1. The data provided by you, the user, for the purpose of associating your Destiny profile with your Patreon account is only ever used for that fact, stored securely through Voluspa.
    3. Usage data
        1. This usage data may be processed for the purposes of analysing the use of the website and services. The legal basis for this processing is your consent or our legitimate interests, namely monitoring and improving our website and services.
    4. Braytech settings sync
        1. Voluspa enables a Braytech feature which allows you, the user, to store your data (Braytech settings) and sync it between instances of Braytech. This information is only accessible to you and the developer.

Last updated Wednesday, May 19, 2021.
